headline: Newmont lays off nearly a dozen managers, plans to merger businesses, Bloomberg News reports
summary: The report said that the company had initiated plans to dismiss one executive and at least 10 senior managers, as per the people who asked not to be named.  Newmont in February this year had said it would trim its workforce to cut debt following its $17.14 billion acquisition of Newcrest.

raw.headline: Newmont lays off nearly a dozen managers, plans to merger businesses, Bloomberg News reports
raw.summary: The report said that the company had initiated plans to dismiss one executive and at least 10 senior managers, as per the people who asked not to be named.  Newmont in February this year had said it would trim its workforce to cut debt following its $17.14 billion acquisition of Newcrest.

headline: Newmont Cuts Management Jobs in Major Corporate Restructuring

headline: Newmont Stock Skids 30% From Its 52-Week High: Should You Buy the Dip?
summary: While NEM's robust portfolio of projects and a healthy growth trajectory paint a promising picture, its high production costs warrant caution.

headline: Newmont to Sell CC&V to SSR Mining for up to $275 Million
summary: NEM expects gross proceeds of up to $275 million, including a cash consideration of $100 million due at closure.
